summary: Defines a Stable Diffusion pipeline class that integrates Intel Extension for PyTorch (IPEX) optimizations, enabling accelerated text-to-image generation on Intel CPUs while preserving the standard Diffusers API and safety features.
business_intent: Showcase and provide a ready‑to‑use implementation for faster, cost‑effective Stable Diffusion inference on Intel hardware, facilitating deployment in production or research environments that require CPU‑based generation.
